cocktails.title: paloma spritz
cocktails.description: tequila blanco cazadores, elderflower liqueur st. germain, lime, smoked grapefruit, sour beer & soda.
cocktails.flavors: floral, pleasantly citric. bubbly and cheerful.

cocktails.title: antonietta
cocktails.flavors: refreshing, delicately herbal and citrusy, with a subtle coconut note, exotic and sparkling.

cocktails.title: cheesecake white negroni
cocktails.description: Martini Bitter, Martini Ambrato vermouth and Noilly Prat Dry, Bombay Sapphire gin, cheesecake infusion.
cocktails.flavors: aromatic and complex, with elegant bitterness, spiced notes and a creamy, subtle finish reminiscent of dessert.

cocktails.title: bitter banana split
cocktails.description: Michter's rye whisky, Martini Bitter, banana liqueur and cacao.
cocktails.flavors: intense and spicy, with deep bitterness, ripe banana sweetness and a velvety cacao finish.

cocktails.title: philly vic punch
cocktails.description: aged rum santa teresa, caramelized peach, red port, peach liqueur, darjeeling tea & lemon.

cocktails.title: after dark
cocktails.description: Patrón Blanco tequila, Cocchi Rosa aperitif, Amaro Montenegro, grapefruit sherbet, lemon.
cocktails.flavors: bright and citrusy, with balanced bitter and sweet layers, floral touches and a vibrant grapefruit finish.

cocktails.title: la última palabra
cocktails.description: mezcal union, green chartreuse, maraschino, lime, pineapple foam & red pepper.

cocktails.title: lonely calling
cocktails.description: Condesa gin, Lonely sherry blend, lemon, lemon sherbet & Angostura bitters.
cocktails.flavors: citrusy and spicy, with fresh botanical notes, vibrant acidity and a dry, aromatic touch.

cocktails.title: closer to god
cocktails.description: Mezcal, Cocchi Americano aperitif, white wine, lemon sherbet, salty chamomile soda.
cocktails.flavors: smoky and citrusy, with herbal freshness and delicate saline notes, elegant and refreshing with a dry floral finish.

cocktails.title: blueberry hill
cocktails.description: Bacardi white rum, Palomino Fino wine, lemon, blueberry jam, egg white & beetroot powder.
cocktails.flavors: tangy and fruity with a silky texture, dry touches and natural sweetness.

cocktails.title: gin fino basil smash
cocktails.description: bombay dry gin, fino sherry wine, basil & lemon

cocktails.title: adonis sour
cocktails.description: martini rubino, amontillado, orange sherbet, and angostura bitters
cocktails.flavors: a man of great beauty, sharp wit, and a touch of bitterness: I’ll take it

cocktails.title: lion's tail
cocktails.description: dewar's white label whisky, bourbon, and pimento dram

cocktails.title: penicillin
cocktails.description: dewar's white label whiskey, lapsang tea, ginger & lemon

vinosNaturales.title: la figa
vinosNaturales.description: red, light and fresh, from garnacha & corognan grape of pau and rabós.

vinosNaturales.title: panorama
vinosNaturales.description: white from the limoux area, light, aromatic and very plesant mouthfill, fills without cloying.

vinosNaturales.title: mandarines
vinosNaturales.description: orange wine from destemmed garnacha blanca.

vinosNaturales.title: blublub
vinosNaturales.description: sparkling wine of a single fermentation, xarel.lo 100% from the ros marina family in font-rubi, penedés.

vinosNaturales.title: virra
vinosNaturales.description: made with the grape skins and refermented with must.
